full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA BGEGS SGROL BA'I LAS GTAD GNAM LCAGS DRAG SNGAGS 'BAR BA'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES DAM SRI SOGS DGRA BGEGS GNAN GTAD BYED PA'I CHO GA DRAG SNGAGS 'BAR BA'I THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI PHYOGS BRAL RGYAL KHAMS MYUL BA'I BYA BRAL BA RIG 'DZIN PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJES BGYIS, ,'DI'I LUNG GI RGYUD PA NI, ,MDZAD PA PO BRAG DKAR SNGAGS RAMS BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS, ,SGO MANG DGE 'DUN BDE CHEN, ,DMAR STON KHYAB BDAG BDE BA'I RDO RJE, HOR KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL, ,HOR BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN, ,CHU BZANG YE SHES RGYA MTSO, ,LHA BTZUN DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN, ,BRAG RI RJE BTZUN GRUB DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG PO, ,DRIN CAN BLA MA RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN SANGS RGYAS SKYABS DPAL BZANG NGO, ,NGES BDAG LA'O, ,)
